page.title: 14HORSES:MRS FORSEY
page.content: At Triscombe there are some stables. The stables are owned by {MRS FORSEY. {Mrs Forsey}has to look after the horses there for other people.{Mrs {Forsey}looks after race horses. At the moment she has some horses there called {COMEDY BASIN }and{COMEDY {STAR}they are not yet famous race horses because they are too young. In the stables there are wood shavings on the floor for the horses to sleep on. In the stables there is a hay net and a food tray the water tray was quite small but every time the horse drank out of it more water came out. The two horses in the stables were 1 or 2 years old. In the field there were two horses one of them hasn't got a name and the other one is called BROWNIE.
